00148 #define LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00149 { \
00150    .id = LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID, \
00151    .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00152    .attributesAmount = ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00153    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00154    .commandsAmount = ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00155    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00156 }
00157 
00158 #define LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00159 { \
00160    .id = LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID, \
00161    .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00162    .attributesAmount = ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00163    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00164    .commandsAmount = ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00165    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00166 }

00242 {
00243   struct PACK
00244   {
00245     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00246     uint8_t type;
00247     uint8_t properties;
00248     uint8_t value;

00251     ZCL_ReportTime_t  maxReportInterval; 
00252     uint8_t           reportableChange;  
00253     ZCL_ReportTime_t  timeoutPeriod;     
00254     uint8_t           lastReportedValue; 
00255   } currentLevel;
00256

00258   {
00259     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00260     uint8_t type;
00261     uint8_t properties;
00262     uint16_t value;
00263   } remainingTime;

00266   {
00267     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
